class_notes: Elementary Persian II, the continuation of Persian 101, is an introductory-level course designed to familiarize students with Persian and to equip them with the tools necessary to continue their study of the language. These courses introduce the Persian alphabet alongside grammar and vocabulary and will emphasize using the language for communication. This class focuses on the development of interpersonal, interpretative, and presentational modes of communication, with special attention to vocabulary and pronunciation. Information about cultural products, perspectives, and practices has been included in the course content to encourage students to use Persian to make connections to and comparisons with other communities and disciplines.
course_description: Prerequisites: Persian 101 or permission of instructor. Continuation of Persian 101.
